name: SpotiBlox
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Roblox but with Spotify theme. All pages don't look perfect but I tried. they should be usable, but if you find an issue feel free to let me know in the comments. Use `Ctrl` + `-` to make the website's size to 90% for a better experience.
additional_info: This theme is made for a 1920x1080 monitor so it might not work properly if you have a smaller monitor.
